messages.subject: Looking for Christian of California
messages.msgSnippet: A shout out to Christian of CA. Anyone have his email? Send it to me offlist. I am supposed to send him some fittings photos, but don t have a working email
messages.messageBody:
A shout out to Christian of CA. Anyone have his email?
Send it to me offlist.

I am supposed to send him some fittings photos, but
don't have a working email address for him.

With advance thanks,

Curran
